entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
